name: Egg Scramble!
description:
Egg Scramble! is a 2D Action game created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 45.

Bok bok! The nests are empty! Fill your Egg Meter by scavenging food from around the yard. When your meter is full, return to a nest to lay an egg. Fill all of the nests to meet your daily quota but watch out for those pesky foxes! BUKAW!

*Recommended to play full screen!*

Controls:

Move: WASD
Pause: P

Changelog:

v0.1.1 (10/8/19)

- Fixed completing Day 1 transitions to Day 3
- Fixed stats displayed on Win/Lose panel are default values
- Fixed logo isn't displayed before title screen

v0.1 (10/7/19)

- initial release
